overview: Filmed in only five days during a hot summer in Marseilles, Emmanuel Marre’s Prix Jean Vigo winning The Summer Movie chronicles the unlikely friendship between an aimless thirty-seven-year-old and his friend’s nine (and-a-half) year-old kid. After Philippe, a middle-aged filmmaker, abruptly quits a job he loved, the trio find themselves on a roadtrip to nowhere.
title: The Summer Movie
